summary:
With +16 years of professional experience in financial and development sectors, I am passioned and committed to improve people`s quality of life through my strategical and critical thinking  

Experience with origination, structuring, advising, negotiation, assessment, facilitating and funding public & private project transactions. Expert in infrastructure projects, PPPs, mixed structures and public sector participation in LATAM. Experienced in controlling and managing complex, detailed, large and multilevel different projects / investments at the same time. Practice with cross functional, cross regional, with high technical knowledge, and publicly sensitive investments. Directed pioneer health PPP in Colombia. Knowledge and track record acting as Director of Public Sectors from the risk side. Supported Investment Banking public & private transactions from origination phase until execution. Experience structuring feasible and bankable infrastructure projects.

Large experience analysing markets and financials, modelling, assessing risks, supervising and presenting project investments with different audiences. Collecting vast experience and knowledge in financing projects (public & private) working with Corporate, Public, Treasury, Project, and Trade Finance Banking. Knowledge of critical credit topics as sovereign risk, country risk, treasury credit-risk operations and financial sector assessment. Experience participating in risk, credit, investment and project committees local and internationally. 

Good at aligning stakeholders and participants interests. Helicopter view integrating different roles into relations and transactions. Skilled at interacting with organizations and actors to mobilize efforts, including C-level and managers. Current and past experience developing institutional relations with a commercial focus. Track record in business development, pipeline generation, manage public & private clients. Track record in supporting and coordinating cross-cultural / functional teams (+100 people), administrating resources and achieving objectives and goals.
